name: v3.0.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_lib", version = "3.0.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE (deprecated)

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "6fd3b1e1a38ca744f9664be4627ced80895c7d2ee353891c172f1ab61309c933",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-3.0.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v3.0.0/bazel-lib-v3.0.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "bazel_lib_dependencies", "bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Required rules_shell dependencies
load("@rules_shell//shell:repositories.bzl", "rules_shell_dependencies", "rules_shell_toolchains")

rules_shell_dependencies()

rules_shell_toolchains()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

bazel_lib_register_toolchains()

# Create the host platform repository transitively required by bazel-lib

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:utils.bzl", "maybe")
load("@platforms//host:extension.bzl", "host_platform_repo")

maybe(
    host_platform_repo,
    name = "host_platform",
)
```

name: v3.0.0-rc.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_lib", version = "3.0.0-rc.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "0758ace949a93f709230a8e08ef35c5f0aacae2ff5d219b27da1d21d8233a709",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-3.0.0-rc.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v3.0.0-rc.0/bazel-lib-v3.0.0-rc.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "bazel_lib_dependencies", "bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Required rules_shell dependencies
load("@rules_shell//shell:repositories.bzl", "rules_shell_dependencies", "rules_shell_toolchains")

rules_shell_dependencies()

rules_shell_toolchains()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

bazel_lib_register_toolchains()

# Create the host platform repository transitively required by bazel-lib

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:utils.bzl", "maybe")
load("@platforms//host:extension.bzl", "host_platform_repo")

maybe(
    host_platform_repo,
    name = "host_platform",
)
```



## What's Changed
* chore: for 3.0, replace Jason with Fabian as maintainer by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1169
* refactor: remove jq toolchain by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1186
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib_gazelle_plugin to v1.8.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1182
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v8.4.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1176
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook commitizen-tools/commitizen to v4.9.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1173
* chore: Split excludes into separate package rules by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1187
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/.github action to v7.2.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1175
* feat: Add clonefile implementation for linux by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1174
* refactor: delete stardoc_with_diff_test by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1188


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/compare/v3.0.0-beta.1...v3.0.0-rc.0

name: v2.21.2
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_bazel_lib", version = "2.21.2")
```

> Read more about bzlmod: <https://blog.aspect.dev/bzlmod>

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "53cadea9109e646a93ed4dc90c9bbcaa8073c7c3df745b92f6a5000daf7aa3da",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.21.2",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.21.2/bazel-lib-v2.21.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Required rules_shell dependencies
load("@rules_shell//shell:repositories.bzl", "rules_shell_dependencies", "rules_shell_toolchains")

rules_shell_dependencies()

rules_shell_toolchains()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()

# Create the host platform repository transitively required by bazel-lib

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:utils.bzl", "maybe")
load("@platforms//host:extension.bzl", "host_platform_repo")

maybe(
    host_platform_repo,
    name = "host_platform",
)
```



## What's Changed
* chore: be explicit that we require bazel 6.5.0 by @peakschris in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1160
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr action to v0.2.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1162
* fix: expand_template propagate runfiles by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1171


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/compare/v2.21.1...v2.21.2

name: v3.0.0-beta.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_lib", version = "3.0.0-beta.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "1010ff64bde0557e6650538b7885fabe803f08ab17974cbeb562170118882f9c",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-3.0.0-beta.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v3.0.0-beta.0/bazel-lib-v3.0.0-beta.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "bazel_lib_dependencies", "bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Required rules_shell dependencies
load("@rules_shell//shell:repositories.bzl", "rules_shell_dependencies", "rules_shell_toolchains")

rules_shell_dependencies()

rules_shell_toolchains()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

bazel_lib_register_toolchains()

# Create the host platform repository transitively required by bazel-lib

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:utils.bzl", "maybe")
load("@platforms//host:extension.bzl", "host_platform_repo")

maybe(
    host_platform_repo,
    name = "host_platform",
)
```



## What's Changed
* fix: write_source_file on Windows when workspace is on different drive than the bazel user folder by @malkia in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1121
* fix: Wrap reference to @platforms in Label() by @EdSchouten in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1120
* feat: support $< in expand_variables by @longlho in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1122
* refactor(3.0): rename module to bazel_lib by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1123
* fix: restore CI testing of 3.0 branch by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1134
* refactor: remove tar toolchain by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1132
* refactor: remove yq toolchain by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1135
* fix: resolve merge conflict from main branch cherry-pick by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1150
* chore(ci): run Linux testing on Buildkite by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1149
* feat: support diff_test/write_source_files on Windows and enable most tests by @peakschris in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1159
* chore: simplify GHA setup by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1166

## New Contributors
* @malkia made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1121
* @EdSchouten made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1120
* @longlho made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1122

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/compare/v2.19.4...v3.0.0-beta.0

name: v2.21.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_bazel_lib", version = "2.21.1")
```

> Read more about bzlmod: <https://blog.aspect.dev/bzlmod>

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "f525668442e4b19ae10d77e0b5ad15de5807025f321954dfb7065c0fe2429ec1",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.21.1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.21.1/bazel-lib-v2.21.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Required rules_shell dependencies
load("@rules_shell//shell:repositories.bzl", "rules_shell_dependencies", "rules_shell_toolchains")

rules_shell_dependencies()

rules_shell_toolchains()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()

# Create the host platform repository transitively required by bazel-lib

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:utils.bzl", "maybe")
load("@platforms//host:extension.bzl", "host_platform_repo")

maybe(
    host_platform_repo,
    name = "host_platform",
)
```



## What's Changed
* fix: don't use version 0.0.0 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1151
* fix(tar): don't expose the toolchain type with @tar.bzl name by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1153
* fix: use bsdtar 3.8.1-fix1 on windows for CRLF fixes by @peakschris in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1152
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/.github action to v7.2.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1127


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/compare/v2.21.0...v2.21.1

name: v2.21.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_bazel_lib", version = "2.21.0")
```

> Read more about bzlmod: <https://blog.aspect.dev/bzlmod>

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "6d636cfdecc7f5c1a5d82b9790fb5d5d5e8aa6ea8b53a71a75f1ba53c8d29f61",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.21.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.21.0/bazel-lib-v2.21.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Required rules_shell dependencies
load("@rules_shell//shell:repositories.bzl", "rules_shell_dependencies", "rules_shell_toolchains")

rules_shell_dependencies()

rules_shell_toolchains()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()

# Create the host platform repository transitively required by bazel-lib

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:utils.bzl", "maybe")
load("@platforms//host:extension.bzl", "host_platform_repo")

maybe(
    host_platform_repo,
    name = "host_platform",
)
```



## What's Changed
* chore: add windows_arm64 support to yq by @dennisameling in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1125
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr action to v0.2.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1116
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v8.3.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1117
* chore(docs): expose filegroup target with proto docs for bzl_library by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1131
* chore(deps): update coreutils to v0.1.0 by @gzm0 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1136
* feat: fix zstd_toolchain and enable root tests on Windows by @peakschris in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1137
* chore: Update Go to 1.24.6 by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1147

## New Contributors
* @dennisameling made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1125
* @peakschris made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1137

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/compare/v2.20.0...v2.21.0

name: v2.19.2
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_bazel_lib", version = "2.19.2")
```

> Read more about bzlmod: <https://blog.aspect.dev/bzlmod>

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "8eb77bd902814bb1a0feb26f5ba5f7444ac18c55359845f5aee30f82f1599a6e",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.19.2",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.19.2/bazel-lib-v2.19.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Required rules_shell dependencies
load("@rules_shell//shell:repositories.bzl", "rules_shell_dependencies", "rules_shell_toolchains")

rules_shell_dependencies()

rules_shell_toolchains()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()

# Create the host platform repository transitively required by bazel-lib

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:utils.bzl", "maybe")
load("@platforms//host:extension.bzl", "host_platform_repo")

maybe(
    host_platform_repo,
    name = "host_platform",
)
```



## What's Changed
* fix: remove references to incompatible_use_toolchain_transition by @benjaminp in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1109

## New Contributors
* @benjaminp made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1109

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/compare/v2.19.1...v2.19.2

name: v2.19.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_bazel_lib", version = "2.19.1")
```

> Read more about bzlmod: <https://blog.aspect.dev/bzlmod>

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "63ae96db9b9ea3821320e4274352980387dc3218baeea0387f7cf738755d0f16",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.19.1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.19.1/bazel-lib-v2.19.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Required rules_shell dependencies
load("@rules_shell//shell:repositories.bzl", "rules_shell_dependencies", "rules_shell_toolchains")

rules_shell_dependencies()

rules_shell_toolchains()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()

# Create the host platform repository transitively required by bazel-lib

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:utils.bzl", "maybe")
load("@platforms//host:extension.bzl", "host_platform_repo")

maybe(
    host_platform_repo,
    name = "host_platform",
)
```

## What's Changed
* refactor: Bazelrc presets: Almost always use common by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1095
* chore: pre-commit config update && autoupdate by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1096
* chore: Exclude prettier hook from renovate by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1097
* fix: Remove references to `@local_config_platform` by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1098
* refactor: Make all bazelrc presets common by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1099
* feat: apply rules_shell fixes to WORKSPACE by @novas0x2a in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1101
* feat: add `windows_arm64` binaries for built-in toolchains by @albertocavalcante in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1102
* chore(release): allow creating a tag from GH UI by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1104
* chore: allow release workflow to be called from tag.yaml by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1105
* chore: add back doc redirects by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1100
* feat: Propose experimental_remote_cache_eviction_retries=5 for bazel 7 by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1106
* fix(release): another spot tag_name wasn't wired through by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1107

## New Contributors
* @albertocavalcante made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1102

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/compare/v2.17.1...v2.19.1

name: v2.17.0
body:
# Do not use, inadvertent breaking change

rules_js fails with a missing public API symbol:
```
ERROR: Traceback (most recent call last):
	File "/home/runner/.bazel/external/aspect_rules_js+/js/private/js_image_layer.bzl", line 16, column 41, in <toplevel>
		load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:tar.bzl", "tar_lib")
Error: file '@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:tar.bzl' does not contain symbol 'tar_lib'
```

## What's Changed

* feat(mtree-spec): add include_runfiles flag by @skeggse in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1068
* chore: docs without compiling protoc by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1063
* feat: publish release attestations by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1069

* fix(release): upgrade release workflow by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1073
* fix(release): name of folder containing binaries by @kormide in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1075
* fix(release): missed a spot in last commit by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1074
* fix(release): yet another spot that's wrong by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1077

name: v2.14.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_bazel_lib", version = "2.14.0")
```

> Read more about bzlmod: <https://blog.aspect.dev/bzlmod>

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "40ba9d0f62deac87195723f0f891a9803a7b720d7b89206981ca5570ef9df15b",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.14.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.14.0/bazel-lib-v2.14.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()

```



## What's Changed
* feat: add Support for Symlinks in tar Rule's Runfiles Handling by @ewianda in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1036
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hooks by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1035
* docs: explain that using pre-release exposes Go dependency by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1042
* fix: expose LC_ALL variable in tar toolchain by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1053
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_go to v0.53.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1049
* fix(deps): update module github.com/bazelbuild/rules_go to v0.53.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1050
* feat: add s390x/linux support by @rickystewart in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1047
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v8.1.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1034
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook crate-ci/typos to v1.30.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1051
* fix(deps): update module golang.org/x/sys to v0.30.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1043
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook commitizen-tools/commitizen to v4.4.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1045
* feat: Add option to pass diff_args in write_source_files macro by @r0bobo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1041

## New Contributors
* @ewianda made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1036

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/compare/v2.13.0...v2.14.0

## What's Changed
* chore(tar): update to latest bsdtar-prebuilt by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1009
* feat(run_binary): add resource_set attribute by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1024
* fix: Rename targets to work with symbolic macros by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1020
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_go to v0.51.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1012
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.52.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1011
* fix(deps): update module github.com/bazelbuild/rules_go to v0.52.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1013
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_go to v0.52.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1026
* chore: Move `--nolegacy_external_runfiles` to version specific rc files by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1017
* fix(deps): update module golang.org/x/sys to v0.29.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1023


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/compare/v2.10.0...v2.11.0

name: v2.10.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:


## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark

    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "7b39d9f38b82260a8151b18dd4a6219d2d7fc4a0ac313d4f5a630ae6907d205d",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.10.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.10.0/bazel-lib-v2.10.0.tar.gz",

```



## What's Changed
* fix(tar): handle directories with spaces in name by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/984
* feat: bats_test: add junit report to test results by @pjjw in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/982
* docs: Update jq docs to show correct escaping by @ChrisChinchilla in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/983
* refactor: Fix no-else-after-return by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/988
* fix: honor umask in write_source_file by @sitaktif in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/986
* fix: Disable the non-deterministic time header when using gzip compression by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/989
* fix(deps): update module golang.org/x/sys to v0.28.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/981
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v7.4.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/971
* fix(bats_test): use env var rather than symbolic link by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/991
* chore(deps): Enable renovate for pre-commit by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/994
* chore: start testing on Bazel 8 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/972
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook keith/pre-commit-buildifier to v7 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1000
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook pre-commit/pre-commit-hooks to v5 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1001
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook commitizen-tools/commitizen to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/999
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook crate-ci/typos to v1.28.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/997
* feat(bzlmod): mark toolchains extension as reproducible by @cerisier in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/970
* feat: Forward RunEnvironmentInfo if present by @molar in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1008
* ci(pre-commit): Add pre-commit CI job by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1002
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v8 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1004
* fix(tar): handle strip_prefix of root directory in mtree_mutate by @j-eid in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/995

## New Contributors
* @ChrisChinchilla made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/983
* @sitaktif made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/986
* @cerisier made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/970
* @molar made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1008
* @j-eid made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/995

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/compare/v2.9.4...v2.10.0

name: v2.9.4
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_bazel_lib", version = "2.9.4")
```

> Read more about bzlmod: <https://blog.aspect.dev/bzlmod>

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "349aabd3c2b96caeda6181eb0ae1f14f2a1d9f3cd3c8b05d57f709ceb12e9fb3",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.9.4",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.9.4/bazel-lib-v2.9.4.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()

```



## What's Changed
* fix: allow_tags_propagation defaults true in 7 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/973
* docs: warn about gzip timestamps by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/979
* fix: access FilesToRunProvider.repo_mapping_manifest indirectly by @plobsing in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/976


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/compare/v2.9.3...v2.9.4

## What's Changed

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/compare/v2.9.2...v2.9.3

name: v2.9.2
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_bazel_lib", version = "2.9.2")
```

> Read more about bzlmod: <https://blog.aspect.dev/bzlmod>

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "0e31778f1fd574d2c05d238bfc4c785fa4b7e50a5ef38b506e01cfd8ec2fccb3",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.9.2",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.9.2/bazel-lib-v2.9.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()

```



## What's Changed
* fix: update metadata.template.json for LF donation by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/950
* feat: support bzlmod runfiles lookups by @plobsing in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/953
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v7.3.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/955
* feat(presets): java bazelrc options by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/947
* fix: unknown repo error with mtree_mutate and Bzlmod by @mering in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/948
* fix(bazelrc): move flag to bazel6.bazelrc by @ajwerner in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/959
* chore(docs): add tar to API listing by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/960
* chore: update old reference to aspect-build/bazel-lib by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/962
* perf: report unused inputs for the tar rule by @plobsing in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/951
* fix(deps): update module github.com/bmatcuk/doublestar/v4 to v4.7.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/961
* fix: Use transitioned target platform for `platform_transition_test` by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/965
* fix: Make build pass with --incompatible_auto_exec_groups by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/963

## New Contributors
* @mering made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/948
* @ajwerner made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/959

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/compare/v2.9.1...v2.9.2

name: v2.9.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_bazel_lib", version = "2.9.1")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
```

## What's Changed
* fix: declare host_platform as non-dev dep by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/945
* fix(presets): restore build runfile links for the 'coverage' command by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/943


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/compare/v2.9.0...v2.9.1

name: v2.9.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_bazel_lib", version = "2.9.0")
```

> Read more about bzlmod: <https://blog.aspect.dev/bzlmod>

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "da67c6a785cdc10faf960a22c44501fe6be357a6ebd2bd6101560f9c2a9e06b3",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.9.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.9.0/bazel-lib-v2.9.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()

```



## What's Changed
* chore: skip linux only tests on non-linux platforms by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/912
* chore: right size tests to supress bazel warning by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/913
* chore: bump to Bazel 7.3.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/914
* refactor: make root workspace bzlmod only by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/915
* chore: enable go, shell, yaml formatters and bazel run //:format by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/917
* chore: remove non-bzlmod dep on @internal_platforms_do_not_use//host:constraints.bzl now that root workspace is bzlmod-only by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/916
* fix: github workflow vulnerable to script injection by @diogoteles08 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/899
* chore: use aspect workflows RBE by @kormide in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/919
* chore: now testing on Aspect Workflows RBE by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/920
* chore: cleanup before bazel-contrib handoff by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/918
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.50.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/925
* fix(deps): update golang.org/x/exp digest to 9b4947d by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/923
* chore(deps): update coreutils to v0.0.27 by @plobsing in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/905
* perf: Improve copy_file.bzl's progress_message and do some cleanup by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/931
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.50.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/930
* feat: performance preset: nobuild_runfiles_links by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/922
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.7.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/924
* chore(deps): upgrade to newest bsdtar by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/940
* fix: add empty files to tar by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/939
* chore: update git urls by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/926
* fix: moving the preserve mtime test logic to Go for portability by @jpinkul in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/908
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_go to v0.50.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/941
* chore: stable job name for branch protection by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/883
* feat: add an option to not include copy_to_directory output in runfiles by @kormide in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/886
* fix(tar): pick up bsdtar windows fix by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/942

## New Contributors
* @diogoteles08 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/899

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/compare/v2.8.1...v2.9.0

name: v2.8.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_bazel_lib", version = "2.8.1")
```

> Read more about bzlmod: <https://blog.aspect.dev/bzlmod>

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "688354ee6beeba7194243d73eb0992b9a12e8edeeeec5b6544f4b531a3112237",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.8.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.8.1/bazel-lib-v2.8.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()

```



## What's Changed
* chore: green up CI on main branch by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/pull/904
* refactor: deprecated expand_locations which is just pass-through to ctx.expand_location() by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/pull/910
* chore: fixup test sizes to resolve warnings by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/pull/911
* fix: correctly split quoted args by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/pull/909


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/compare/v2.8.0...v2.8.1
